page.title: 17ST BERNARD'S,HIGH WYCOMBE
page.content: St.Bernard's is a {Roman Catholic} Secondary school.The age of the pupils is eleven to sixteen years. It is built on seventeen acres south of High Wycombe. Pupils can learn Geography,History, Music,French and Physical Education. The school holds 840 pupils.The building is ten years old and it has several playing fields at the back of it. It has a large gymnasium.The junior pupils at this school have forty minutes of{homework }each night, and the senior pupils have one hour and twenty minutes each night.
